subject: Adobe Suite 3 Design Premium
body:
The great majority of men are bundles of beginnings.

Books and harlots have their quarrels in public.

You can often measure a person by the size of his dream.

A good heart will help you to a bonny face, my lad and a bad one will turn the bonniest into something worse than ugly.

Cash-payment is not the sole nexus of man with man.

Age imprints more wrinkles in the mind than it does on the face.

The house appointed for all the living.

The greatest failure is a person who never admits that he can be a failure.

We are given children to test us and make us more spiritual.

Man makes holy what he believes.

Though by whim, envy, or resentment led, they damn those authors whom they never read.

Husbands are like fires. They go out when unattended.

Age considers youth ventures.
